You are Player 0 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).
- Reveal costs 1 info token; if you have 0 info tokens, [Reveal] is invalid.
- Provide exactly one hint type: either 'color C' OR 'rank R' (not both).
- The hint must be truthful about that specific target card.
- Colors: white, yellow, green, blue, red. Ranks: 1-5.

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

You are Player 1 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).
- Reveal costs 1 info token; if you have 0 info tokens, [Reveal] is invalid.
- Provide exactly one hint type: either 'color C' OR 'rank R' (not both).
- The hint must be truthful about that specific target card.
- Colors: white, yellow, green, blue, red. Ranks: 1-5.

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

You are Player 1 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).
- Reveal costs 1 info token; if you have 0 info tokens, [Reveal] is invalid.
- Provide exactly one hint type: either 'color C' OR 'rank R' (not both).
- The hint must be truthful about that specific target card.
- Colors: white, yellow, green, blue, red. Ranks: 1-5.

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

You are Player 1 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).
- Reveal costs 1 info token; if you have 0 info tokens, [Reveal] is invalid.
- Provide exactly one hint type: either 'color C' OR 'rank R' (not both).
- The hint must be truthful about that specific target card.
- Colors: white, yellow, green, blue, red. Ranks: 1-5.

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.

- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].

Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

You are Player 0 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).
- Reveal costs 1 info token; if you have 0 info tokens, [Reveal] is invalid.
- Provide exactly one hint type: either 'color C' OR 'rank R' (not both).
- The hint must be truthful about that specific target card.
- Colors: white, yellow, green, blue, red. Ranks: 1-5.

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

You are Player 1 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).
- Reveal costs 1 info token; if you have 0 info tokens, [Reveal] is invalid.
- Provide exactly one hint type: either 'color C' OR 'rank R' (not both).
- The hint must be truthful about that specific target card.
- Colors: white, yellow, green, blue, red. Ranks: 1-5.

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.

Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.

You are Player 1 in a 2-player Hanabi game.
You can see other players' cards but NOT your own. Work as a team to build fireworks.

Goal: For each color, play ranks 1â†’5 in order. Wrong plays cost 1 fuse token.
Colors are independent; you may play the next required rank of any color at any time.
You have 3 action types: Play, Discard, Reveal. Output EXACTLY ONE action, nothing else.
Valid formats (case-insensitive):
- [Play] X
- [Discard] X
- [Reveal] player N card X color C
- [Reveal] player N card X rank R

Index rules:
- X is a 0-based card index from YOUR hand for [Play]/[Discard].
- In this env, a [Reveal] targets exactly ONE specific card index in another player's hand.

Reveal rules in this env (NOTE: not standard Hanabi):
- You must reveal about another player (not yourself).

Discard rule: if info tokens < 8, discarding gains +1 info token.
Play rule: if you successfully play a rank-5 card and info tokens < 8, gain +1 info token.
Game ends if fuse tokens reach 0, all fireworks reach 5, or the deck is exhausted and the final round ends.
